section_title: AFFORESTATION, REFORESTATION AND DEFORESTATION UNDER ARTICLE 3.3
sentences: On Monday, 10 July, the workshop considered afforestation, reforestation and deforestation (ARD) under Article 3.3 of the Kyoto Protocol.
Participants heard presentations from lead authors of the IPCC Special Report on LULUCF, as well as speeches by representatives of five country Parties.
These presentations were followed by a general discussion on the issue.
enb_long_title: Workshop on Land-Use, Land-Use Change and Forestry
